title: Man Faces 6 Months in Jail For Disagreeing With Feminists on Twitter

embed.description: A Canadian man faces 6 months in jail for disagreeing with feminists on Twitter, a case that one journalist warns "could have enormous fallout for free speech." http://news.nationalpost.com/full-comment/christie-blatchford-ruling-in-twitter-harassment-trial-could-have-enormous-fallout-for-free-speech

body: Canada is such a disgrace to NA. This is why Freedom of Speech is the most important protection you can be given.
